version_description: Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.

Invite family members by text message - Grow your tree with the help of your family members. Now you can invite relatives to join your family site via text message, go to their profiles and tap the paper plane icon.
Review your DNA Matches - Research your DNA Matches and learn how you're related. Review shared ancestral surnames, shared ethnicities and more.
Grow your tree together. Sync your contacts to your tree and invite your entire family to join in a few easy steps. To do so, enter the Invite members section in the main menu.
Enhanced family research - Use our new powerful research capabilities to find what you’re looking for from our collection of over 8 billion historical records.
Enhanced family research - Use our new powerful research capabilities to find what you’re looking for from our collection of over 8 billion historical records.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.
Scan to activate your DNA kit - Now you can activate your MyHeritage DNA kit by simply scanning the activation code with your device’s camera. To do so, open the app menu and select Activate DNA kit.

- Support for iPhone X
- Photo Discoveries™ - Easily add personal photos of your relatives that are found on MyHeritage to your family tree.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.
In response to popular demand, Contacting DNA Matches is now available to all MyHeritage DNA users for free.
Inbox - Contact your DNA Matches, site owners with whom you share Smart Matches™, and members of your family site directly through the app to collaborate and expand your family tree.
Inbox - Contact your DNA Matches, site owners with whom you share Smart Matches™, and members of your family site directly through the app to collaborate and expand your family tree.

Photo & document scanner - Now you can use your mobile device to preserve old photos and historical documents — and upload them to your family tree — directly through the app. Access the scanner from the Photos section or any tree profile.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.

Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.

Two-Factor Authentication - This app now supports an added layer of security with Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This feature helps secure your account and your personal data on MyHeritage. To opt in, go to your account settings on myheritage.com.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.

Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.

Pedigree view - The popular Pedigree View is here to help you navigate your family’s direct ancestral lines. Tap the tree icon on the top right corner of your family tree to switch to the Pedigree View.
Support and optimization for iOS 12 to help you make meaningful discoveries, faster.
Further tweaks and improvements to make managing your family tree and DNA kits as easy as possible.

Pedigree view - The popular Pedigree View is here to help you navigate your family’s direct ancestral lines. Tap the tree icon on the top right corner of your family tree to switch to the Pedigree View.

Extract info from Smart Matches™ - Now you can save the specific information you want from Smart Matches™. After confirming a Smart Match™, select only the new facts, photos, and relatives you want to save to your family tree.

Family timelines - Explore your relatives' family timelines and watch their personal stories unfold. To view a timeline, select a tree profile and tap on the timeline icon at the top.

Colorize your old black and white photos and see your ancestors in a whole new light. Tap any photo, select Colorize, and watch your family photos come to life in vibrant colors.
